description: Alola Detective Lucky`s Smeargle stars on the television series Alola Detective Lucky (アローラ探偵ラキ) which airs on Alola TV in the Alola region. Alola Detective Lucky`s deductions never miss their mark as his deductions are logical and the way he confronts the culprit is daring. His case solve rate is 100 percent. Smeargle is Lucky`s assistant and accompanies him on his cases. It wears an Inverness cape like Arthur Conan Doyle`s famous detective Sherlock Holmes.
name: Doble (Alola Tantei Lucky)
